original_title: Duke Ellington: Love You Madly / A Concert of Sacred Music at Grace Cathedral
overview: Described as "the best film about Duke Ellington ever made" by the jazz legend himself, "Love You Madly" combines a behind-the-scenes profile with performance footage from Basin St. West Jazz Club, the 1965 Monterey Jazz Festival and the "Concert of Sacred Music" at Grace Cathedral. A second Emmy-nominated program captures the full magic of Ellington's 1965 "Concert of Sacred Music," a mix of classical, spirituals, gospel, blues and jazz.
title: Duke Ellington: Love You Madly / A Concert of Sacred Music at Grace Cathedral
